resources.string: Welcome to Farmer,Wolf,Goat and Cabbage Puzzle

A farmer and his wolf,goat and cabbage come to the edge of a river they wish to cross.There is a boat at the river\'s edgethat only the farmer can row.The farmer can take at most one other object beside himself on a crossing, but if the wolf is ever left with the goat, the wolf will eat goat; similarly if the goat is left with cabbage, the goat will eat cabbage. Desvise a sequence of crossing of the river so that all four charactersarrive safety on the other side.
